md:
giải nghĩa từ "meet" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan

**Meet**

* Verb: gặp gỡ, gặp mặt, gặp lại
	+ Example: I will meet you at the park at 5pm.
	+ Related words: encounter, gather, assemble
* Verb: đáp ứng, thỏa mãn
	+ Example: The new policy meets the needs of the community.
	+ Related words: satisfy, fulfill, comply
* Verb: tham gia, tham dự
	+ Example: She will meet the team at the conference.
	+ Related words: attend, participate, join

Note: Depending on the context, "meet" can have different meanings and connotations. The above explanations are some of the most common uses of the word.

Meet

  • Verb: gặp gỡ, gặp mặt, gặp lại
    • Example: I will meet you at the park at 5pm.
    • Related words: encounter, gather, assemble
  • Verb: đáp ứng, thỏa mãn
    • Example: The new policy meets the needs of the community.
    • Related words: satisfy, fulfill, comply
  • Verb: tham gia, tham dự
    • Example: She will meet the team at the conference.
    • Related words: attend, participate, join

Note: Depending on the context, "meet" can have different meanings and connotations. The above explanations are some of the most common uses of the word.
